archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0732
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a simple business customer when I have specific numbers that are bothering my company, I want to block specific numbers for all my devices myself, so that I don't have to worry that my business security is under threat

properties.value: What is the channel to do such changes? Is it for Comarch?

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
